title: (x) 80s ad style condensed serif fonts - ITC Garamond cond, Platin Cond {Akira}
content:
I've seen a few of these blocky style serif fonts cropping up, unfortunately couldn't find the Heineken/Stella Artois example, but it is a UK print campaign running now where the head of a beer is 'sculpted' into the shape of various "continental" objects.

Many thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130117002456im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font1_3466.jpg)
author: daikw
